attributes.action: To keep any increase money on benefits and not have it taken off another
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as the m.p's get a payment for a second home and all that they want for it-plus more. why is it that people on benefit's who get an increase in their payment. only have it taken off another-which is so unfair. it is hard enough to live on what we all get on benefit's.

rejection.details: Please rephrase your petition and resubmit
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
